DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether insulin resistance might affect the pathogenesis of hypertensive disorders in pregnancy since midtrimester. Furthermore, markers of vascular and placental injuries, of oxidative stress and inflammation will be evaluated.
DOC.brief_title: Insulin Resistance and Hypertensive Disorders in Pregnancy
DOC.criteria: PCOS, BMI>/=30 previous pregnancy affected by hypertension or gestational diabetes thrombophilia Type I or II diabetes mellitus autoimmune diseases twin pregnancy renal diseases previous preeclampsia in relatives
